participant_1.background:
I like to laugh and help animals in my free time.
i go to multiple comic cons.
i have been married five times.
I'm proud of the time I traveled the country in my car
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!

participant_2.background:
I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands.
I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling.
i love starbucks coffee.
i am one of four children.
I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing great, thank you! I just got back from a trip to the mountains.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! Did you do anything exciting while you were there?
I hiked up a volcano with my dog! It was a lot of work, but it was so worth it. The views from the top were amazing.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time. I love hiking, but I've never been up a volcano before.
It was definitely a challenge, but it was so rewarding. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who's up for the challenge.
I'll definitely have to keep that in mind! I love trying new things.
Me too! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to cook and bake. I also like to create things with my hands.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I also love to bake bread.
Those are both great choices! I love pasta, and I love fresh bread.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Yeah, me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Me too! I hope we can talk again sometime.
